column4: so, i can asume that on a computer with two soundcards, its not possible to have correct sound with ubuntu?
it looks like there are some alsa/modprobe config things you can do, google turns up some things, posting to the ml/forum might help too
i found a guide for gnome, but i use kubuntu, i figured out how to change de default on arts, but not all apps use arts, os i have to change the default of alsa too
